price: 50. Mais lorsque Nous eûmes mis fin à leur supplice, voilà qu’ils se parjurèrent.
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-ʿadhāba idhā hum yankuthūna
